phrases.original: Authorization Needed
phrases.translated: Authorization Needed

phrases.original: Hello, {FIRST-NAME}! Although your login is accurate, you'll still need to get authorized before you can start using the Invites App.
phrases.translated: Hello, {FIRST-NAME}! Although your login is accurate, you'll still need to get authorized before you can start using the Invites App.

phrases.original: This is necessary in order to ensure that every registered user is a genuine disciple of Jesus and is a member in good standing with their local church congregation.
phrases.translated: This is necessary in order to ensure that every registered user is a genuine disciple of Jesus and is a member in good standing with their local church congregation.

phrases.original: Instructions:
phrases.translated: Instructions:

phrases.original: Find someone who can authorize you.
phrases.translated: Find someone who can authorize you.

phrases.original: Within your congregation there are other registered users of the Invites App who have the necessary access to authorize you. You'll need to find one of them.
phrases.translated: Within your congregation there are other registered users of the Invites App who have the necessary access to authorize you. You'll need to find one of them.

phrases.original: Here is a list of authorizing users.
phrases.translated: Here is a list of authorizing users.

phrases.original: Show them the QR Code.
phrases.translated: Show them the QR Code.

phrases.original: When you have found someone who can authorize you, click on the button below. A QR Code will appear. Ask them to authorize you by scanning it.
phrases.translated: When you have found someone who can authorize you, click on the button below. A QR Code will appear. Ask them to authorize you by scanning it.

phrases.original: Once you are approved, log in again.
phrases.translated: Once you are approved, log in again.

phrases.original: Ready?
phrases.translated: Ready?

phrases.original: Show QR Code
phrases.translated: Show QR Code

phrases.original: Please authorize me
phrases.translated: Please authorize me

phrases.original: Please authorize {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} to use the Invites App, by scanning the QR Code below and completing the form.
phrases.translated: Please authorize {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} to use the Invites App, by scanning the QR Code below and completing the form.

phrases.original: Authorizing Users
phrases.translated: Authorizing Users

phrases.original: Please find the following person in the fellowship. Explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App.
phrases.translated: Please find the following person in the fellowship. Explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App.

phrases.original: Please find one of the following people in the fellowship. Explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App.
phrases.translated: Please find one of the following people in the fellowship. Explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App.

phrases.original: No authorizing users were found in your congregation.
phrases.translated: No authorizing users were found in your congregation.

phrases.original: Close
phrases.translated: Close

phrases.original: Registered on {REGISTRATION-DATE}
phrases.translated: Registered on {REGISTRATION-DATE}

phrases.original: Has someone scanned this QR Code?
phrases.translated: Has someone scanned this QR Code?

phrases.original: Authorization in progress...
phrases.translated: Authorization in progress...

phrases.original: Still waiting?
phrases.translated: Still waiting?

phrases.original: Check your internet connection, and ask the person who scanned the QR code to do the same.
phrases.translated: Check your internet connection, and ask the person who scanned the QR code to do the same.

phrases.original: Alternatively, you may ask someone else to authorize you.
phrases.translated: Alternatively, you may ask someone else to authorize you.

phrases.original: Check again
phrases.translated: Check again

phrases.original: Authorization Granted
phrases.translated: Authorization Granted

phrases.original: You are now authorized.
phrases.translated: You are now authorized.

phrases.original: Congratulations! You are now fully authorized to use the Invites App. Please log in once again.
phrases.translated: Congratulations! You are now fully authorized to use the Invites App. Please log in once again.
